original_text: In that day from the river Euphrates to the Brook of Egypt the Lord will thresh out the grain, and you will be gleaned one by one, O people of Israel.
korean_text: 너희 이스라엘 자손들아 그 날에 여호와께서 창일하는 하수에서부터 애굽 시내에까지 과실을 떠는 것 같이 너희를 하나하나 모으시리라

sentences.original_text: from the river Euphrates to the Brook of Egypt
the Lord will thresh out the grain
you will be gleaned one by one
